title: Update Statue SSG SIte Theme and Content
description: Update the overall theme and content for your Statue SSG generated site.
message:
You are tasked with updating files for a SvelteKit site generated via a pre-configured static site generator.

For all specified files, your code should adhere to the following thematic and content specifications while maintaining the original code's general structure: {{input:What thematic and general content updates would you like to make?}}
system:
Always return exactly five seperate code blocks. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory of the file before each code block.

The first code block should always only include the code to the main page's .svelte file located at src/routes/+page.svelte. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/routes/+page.svelte}}. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory before the code block.

The second code block should always only include the code for the site's header .svelte file located at src/lib/components/NavigationBar.svelte. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/lib/components/NavigationBar.svelte}}. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory before the code block.

The third code block should always only include the code to the site's .svelte file located at src/routes/[directory]/+page.svelte. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/routes/[directory]/+page.svelte}}. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory before the code block.

The fourth code block should always only include the code to the site's .svelte file located at src/routes/[...slug]/+page.svelte. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/routes/[...slug]/+page.svelte}}. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory before the code block.

The fifth code block should always only include the code to the site's .svelte file located at src/routes/about/+page.svelte. In generating the code, reference the following code: {{file:src/routes/about/+page.svelte}}. Include a brief description of the changes made and the relative directory before the code block.
